      • viewEstimationBase

        public void viewEstimationBase()
        Set the estimation base pane to visible when button is hit. All others are set to invisible.

      • viewRequirementsEntry

        public void viewRequirementsEntry()
        Set the requirements pane to visible when button is hit. All others are set to invisible.

      • viewMainScIcr

        public void viewMainScIcr()
        Set the SC/ICR entry pane to visible when button is hit. All others are set to invisible.

      • changeDatabasePath

        public void changeDatabasePath()
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.net.URISyntaxException,
                               java.sql.SQLException
        Changes the path string located in the file path.dat to a new path that the user gets with a file chooser.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If I/O error occurs.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If path cannot be found.
        java.sql.SQLException - If connection cannot be found.

                            throws java.io.IOException
        If the user chooses to add or edit a baseline from the menu bar feature.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If I/O error occurs.
